room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Mysteries" by Escape Haus in San Marcos
review: My friends and I had an amazing time solving the Egyptian Mysteries room last weekend! The puzzles were challenging enough to keep us engaged without being frustrating. The staff was very friendly and kept us engaged in the room. We're already planning to come back and solve the others!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Mysteries" by Escape Haus in San Marcos
review: Had such a great time escaping from inside the Egyptian room! So fun and exciting! Me and my group will definitely return to conquer another escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Mysteries" by Escape Haus in San Marcos
review: My husband, son, daughter-in-law and 3 other couples did the Egyptian Room tonight for my birthday. We had a blast! None of us had ever been to an activity like this before so we were a little bit slow in starting out but it didn't take us long to get into the swing of things. We really enjoyed it!
